title: How Will Fiora's Chroma Work?
body:
I am curious as to how Headmistress Fiora's chroma will work. Will it only be available to holders of the legacy skin or will the skins imply cease to be legacy and be present in the store. 
Any ideas?

replies.body:
Hey! 

he Headmistress Fiora chromas will **always** be available, despite Headmistress Fiora being a legacy skin.

**EDIT**: Due to the functionality of the store, the chromas will only be available when the Headmistress Fiora is available. Super sorry for the misguided information.
Wow, didn't expect a rioter response. Sounds gucci. Now I'm hyped to be styling with headmistress in **ALL THE COLORS**, thanks

Aww yiss! Which is your favorite?

**EDIT**: As noted above, we've run into some store functionality issues, which means that the chromas will only be available when Headmistress Fiora is. D: (Again, wicked sorry!)
Wait, does this mean that the chromas wont become available until the next time you can buy Headmistress Fiora or can people who already own it buy the chromas whenever?

From what I understand, the chromas will be available for purchase when Headmistress Fiora is available. It won't always be available to purchase for those who already own Headmistress Fiora. Of course, if you own the chroma, you'll always have access to it.

Is there any way you can resolve this "isue"? I main fiora and own all the skins, I just found out today that fiora has chromas, went to the store wanting to buy it and it wasn't there. I thought it might be a store bug, googled it and to my surprise, it said that it was only available until yesterday.

My heart broke knowing that I'll have to wait a whole year to buy them again after reading this thread.

We should be able to buy chromas if we own some sort of legacy skin.
Based on the store functionality, this isn't currently something supported, so for now, this is working as intended, unfortunately.

The reasoning here is, we don't want someone to purchase the chromas and then not be able to purchase the skin for them. I can't speak to any plans for availability of the parent skin (Headmistress Fiora herself), but I'd be happy to pass along the feedback around it! :)

Hey, are there any other chroma skins that work like this? I own all of Fiora's skins, and I just got enough to buy the headmistress Fiora chroma's that I want, and am super sad that I have to wait. I just wanted to know if there were any other "legacy chroma's", because I can't find any other post about them.

Hi! 

I don't believe that there are at this time. The chromas pod has been trying out variations of chromas availability; most recently launching chromas with a new skin. 

I do appreciate your feedback, though. I'll sync up with the pod about it. :)

Excuse me, When they brought back the chromas for an IP sale, I could've sworn I bought ALL the head mistress fiora chroma packs for IP. Yet I do not own all, I only own 2 which I bought a while ago. I look in my purchase history, It's not there though. I see it was released with dunkmaster darius and I own all of those chromas due to the IP sale. I know I bought them but I do not own them besides 2.

Honestly I'm pretty upset too, I was going to buy one of the chromas today, I've had the skin for ages.

If its just a problem with the store, maybe this can be fixed when new client comes out??
Um i have Headmistress Fiora but it still doesnt give me the option to buy the chroma or the pack

Probably still legacy only.
And Headmistress Fiora is/was available recently.
